Title: Relates to including providing onsite child daycare facilities by a project into a uniform tax exemption policy
Summary: Includes providing onsite child daycare facilities by a project into a uniform tax exemption policy.
LawCode: Amd §874, Gen Muni L; amd §§1963-a & 2315, Pub Auth L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general municipal law and the public authorities law, in relation to including providing onsite child daycare facilities by a project into a uniform tax exemption policy
